en.title: Bastien Guillon
en.subtitle: Software Engineer
en.introduction: Fullstack developer for over 8 years, I place great importance on code quality while remaining pragmatic about constraints. I enjoy sharing my knowledge, learning from others, and fostering a team dynamic based on mutual support and constructive, benevolent discussions.

lucca.description:
Since 2016, I have progressed from a junior fullstack developer to leading a team of 4, then working as a senior developer on new projects. I have worked within different teams, contributing to the implementation of robust software architectures, particularly in DDD and Clean Architecture.

I have been involved in designing and developing various solutions using .NET Framework & Core, SQL Server, RabbitMQ, and Angular, taking on increasing responsibilities such as team leadership and defining best development practices. These diverse experiences have strengthened my technical skills while contributing to the company's growth.

details.title: Learn more
items: Development of the personnel file reporting system (AngularJS, .NET Framework)
Design and development of the personnel file in AngularJS, then migration to Angular
Design, development, and integration of the banner displayed across all Lucca applications (web component in StencilJS)
Co-creation of the Lucca Faces application during an offsite in Barcelona (Angular, .NET Core)
Redesign of the authentication system for Lucca applications in .NET Core
Redesign of the employee onboarding administration interface in Angular and .NET Core
Creation of the administration interface for Lucca applications and modules (AppStore)
Design and development of the complete revamp of the BloomAtWork application in .NET Core and Angular (originally in PHP), rebranded as Poplee Engagement

Adaptation of APIs, database, and interfaces to make resources translatable, enabling multilingual QVCT survey distribution to employees based on their language, multi-language user role definitions, personnel file data, and more

cea.location: French Alternative Energies and Atomic Energy Commission (CEA), Saclay
cea.description: Development of C# and WPF applications for data acquisition and visualization from sensors. Creation of a touch-based development environment for expert system design, integrating image processing algorithms in fuzzy mathematical morphology.

fr.title: Bastien Guillon

fr.introduction: Développeur fullstack depuis plus de 8 ans, j'accorde une grande importance à la qualité du code tout en restant pragmatique face aux contraintes. J'aime partager mes connaissances, apprendre des autres et contribuer à une dynamique d'équipe basée sur l'entraide et le débat bienveillant et constructif.

lucca.description:
Depuis 2016, j'ai évolué de développeur fullstack junior à lead d'une équipe de 4 personnes, puis en tant que développeur senior sur de nouveaux projets. J'ai travaillé au sein de différentes équipes, contribuant à la mise en place d'architectures logicielles robustes, notamment en DDD et Clean Architecture.

J'ai participé à la conception et au développement de solutions variées utilisant .NET Framework & Core, SQL Server, RabbitMQ et Angular, et j'ai pris en charge des responsabilités croissantes, telles que l'encadrement de l'équipe et la définition de bonnes pratiques de développement. Cette diversité d'expériences m'a permis de renforcer mes compétences techniques tout en contribuant à la croissance de l'entreprise.
